lead_paragraph: The Argentine star Walter Herrmann is close to signing a deal with the Charlotte Bobcats. The 6-6 Herrmann, who has scored 48 points in Argentina’s two victories in the world championship, said he hoped to sign a one-year deal before the tournament ends Sept. 3.
